mapper.insert: insert into notice(notice_no, notice_title, notice_content, notice_regdate, notice_readcount) values(noticeno_seq.NEXTVAL, #{notice_title}, #{notice_content}, sysdate, 0)
mapper.update: update notice set notice_title = #{notice_title}, notice_content = #{notice_content}, notice_updatedate = sysdate where notice_no = #{notice_no}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from notice where
notice_no > 0
